attributes.action: Relationship and sex education (RSE) should not be compulsory religious reasons.
attributes.additional_details:
Relationship and sex education (RSE) should not be compulsory from 2020 For religious reasons.
Consent must still be required from their parents for participation during these sessions.
attributes.background:
